mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_buyer, cart_buycount, cart_fruitnumber) VALUES (#{cart_buyer}, #{cart_buycount}, #{cart_fruitnumber})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_number, c.cart_buyer, c.cart_buycount, i.item_name, i.item_price, i.item_image FROM cart c JOIN item i ON c.cart_fruitnumber = i.item_number WHERE c.cart_buyer = #{buyer}
